author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r1635.
* buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(log): Make the function static, add a separator after the log prefix.

author: lgo
msg: * buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(log): New function to log to console.
(*): Use the new log function for improved code readability without reducing
performance.

author: lgo
msg: Don't hide fatal SSL errors in the "close notify" handling logic.
* buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(ssl_decrypt): Check for all contitions needed for a graceful shutdown
of the connection, otherwise bail out with a fatal error.

author: lgo
msg: On Windows, a socket error can result in ECONNABORTED. This should be treated
identically to ECONNRESET.
* outgoing.c
(write_to_connection, read_from_connection): where we read from or write to
a socket, handle both ECONNRESET and ECONNABORTED gracefully so that serf
can continue sending requests on a new socket.

author: lgo
msg: Replace APR_EGENERAL error with two SSL specific error codes.
* serf.h: New error codes SERF_ERROR_SSL_CERT_FAILED and
SERF_ERROR_SSL_COMM_FAILED
* buckets/ssl_buckets.c
(*): Use the two new codes instead of APR_EGENERAL.
* context.c
(serf_error_string): give a description for the new error codes.
